verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician אֶל־ <WH413> [T'el-about שֹׁשַׁנִּ֑ים sho-shan-Nim; עֵד֖וּת <WH7802> 'e-Dut upon Shoshannimeduth לְאָסָ֣ף <WH623> le-'a-Saf of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz-Mor. A Psalm רֹ֘עֵ֤ה <WH7462> ro-'Eh O Shepherd יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל׀ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel הַאֲזִ֗ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah, Give ear נֹהֵ֣ג <WH5090> no-Heg thou that leadest כַּצֹּ֣אן <WH6629> katz-Tzon like a flock יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> yo-Sef; Joseph יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev thou that dwellest הַכְּרוּבִ֣ים <WH3742> hak-ke-ru-Vim [between] the cherubims הוֹפִֽיעָה׃ <WH3313> ho-Fi-'ah. shine forth

לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> lif-Nei Before אֶפְרַ֨יִם׀ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וּבִנְיָ֘מִ֤ן <WH1144> u-vin-Ya-Min and Benjamin וּמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> u-me-nash-Sheh, and Manasseh עוֹרְרָ֥ה <WH5782> 'or-Rah stir up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- גְּבֽוּרָתֶ֑ךָ <WH1369> ge-vu-ra-Te-cha; thy strength וּלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> u-le-Chah and come לִישֻׁעָ֣תָה <WH3444> li-shu-'A-tah [and] save לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <WH215> ve-ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha, and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot; of hosts עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָתַ֥י <WH4970> ma-Tai How עָ֝שַׁ֗נְתָּ <WH6225> 'a-Shan-ta, how long wilt thou be angry בִּתְפִלַּ֥ת <WH8605> bit-fil-Lat against the prayer עַמֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha. You

הֶ֭אֱכַלְתָּם <WH398> He-'e-chal-tom Thou feedest לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem them with the bread דִּמְעָ֑ה <WH1832> dim-'Ah; of tears וַ֝תַּשְׁקֵ֗מוֹ <WH8248> vat-tash-Ke-mov, to drink בִּדְמָע֥וֹת <WH1832> bid-ma-'ot and givest them tears שָׁלִֽישׁ׃ <WH7991> sha-Lish. in great measure

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <WH7760> te-si-Me-nu Thou makest מָ֭דוֹן <WH4066> Ma-don us a strife לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <WH7934> lish-che-Nei-nu; unto our neighbours וְ֝אֹיְבֵ֗ינוּ <WH341> ve-'o-ye-Vei-nu, and our enemies יִלְעֲגוּ־ <WH3932> yil-'a-gu- laugh לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again וְהָאֵ֥ר <WH215> ve-ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha, and cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved

גֶּ֭פֶן <WH1612> Ge-fen a vine מִמִּצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt תַּסִּ֑יעַ <WH5265> tas-Si-a'; Thou hast brought תְּגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> te-ga-Resh thou hast cast out גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> go-Yim, the heathen וַתִּטָּעֶֽהָ׃ <WH5193> vat-tit-ta-'E-ha. and planted

פִּנִּ֥יתָ <WH6437> pin-Ni-ta Thou preparedst לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <WH6440> le-fa-Nei-ha; [room] before וַתַּשְׁרֵ֥שׁ <WH8327> vat-tash-Resh root שָׁ֝רָשֶׁ֗יהָ <WH8328> ra-Shei-ha, it and didst cause it to take deep וַתְּמַלֵּא־ <WH4390> vat-te-mal-le- and it filled אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. the land

כָּסּ֣וּ <WH3680> kas-Su were covered הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> ha-Rim The hills צִלָּ֑הּ <WH6738> tzil-Lah; with the shadow וַ֝עֲנָפֶ֗יהָ <WH6057> va-'a-na-Fei-ha, of it and the boughs אַֽרְזֵי־ <WH730> 'ar-zei- cedars אֵֽל׃ <WH410> 'El. thereof [were like] the goodly

תְּשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> te-shal-Lach She sent out קְצִירֶ֣הָ <WH7105> ke-tzi-Re-ha her boughs עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against יָ֑ם <WH3220> Yam; unto the sea וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- to נָ֝הָ֗ר <WH5104> na-Har, unto the river יֽוֹנְקוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3127> Yon-ko-Tei-ha. and her branches

לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why פָּרַ֣צְתָּ <WH6555> pa-Ratz-ta Why hast thou [then] broken down גְדֵרֶ֑יהָ <WH1447> ge-de-Rei-ha; her hedges וְ֝אָר֗וּהָ <WH717> ve-'a-Ru-ha, do pluck כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֹ֥בְרֵי <WH5674> oe-rei so that all they which pass דָֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> Da-rech. by the way

יְכַרְסְמֶ֣נָּֽה <WH3765> ye-char-se-Men-nah doth waste חֲזִ֣יר <WH2386> cha-Zir The boar מִיָּ֑עַר <WH3293> mi-Ya-'ar; out of the wood וְזִ֖יז <WH2123> ve-Ziz it and the wild beast שָׂדַ֣י <WH7704> sa-Dai of the field יִרְעֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7462> yir-'En-nah. doth devour

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him we beseech thee O God צְבָאוֹת֮ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts שֽׁ֫וּב־ <WH7725> Shuv- Return נָ֥א <WH4994> na now הַבֵּ֣ט <WH5027> hab-Bet look down מִשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> mish-sha-Ma-yim from heaven וּרְאֵ֑ה <WH7200> u-re-'Eh; and behold וּ֝פְקֹ֗ד <WH6485> u-fe-Kod, and visit גֶּ֣פֶן <WH1612> Ge-fen this vine זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> Zot. Even

וְ֭כַנָּה <WH3657> Ve-chan-nah the shoot אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָטְעָ֣ה <WH5193> na-te-'Ah hath planted יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha; which thy right hand וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and on בֵּ֝֗ן <WH1121> Ben, and the branch אִמַּ֥צְתָּה <WH553> 'im-Matz-tah [that] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

שְׂרֻפָ֣ה <WH8313> se-ru-Fah [It is] burned בָאֵ֣שׁ <WH784> va-'Esh with fire כְּסוּחָ֑ה <WH3683> ke-su-Chah; [it is] cut down מִגַּעֲרַ֖ת <WH1606> mig-ga-'a-Rat at the rebuke פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha of thy countenance יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> yo-Ve-du. they perish

תְּֽהִי־ <WH1961> te-hi- Let יָ֭דְךָ <WH3027> Ya-de-cha Let thy hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- be upon אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish be upon the man יְמִינֶ֑ךָ <WH3225> ye-mi-Ne-cha; of thy right hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- upon the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man אִמַּ֥צְתָּ <WH553> 'im-Matz-ta [whom] thou madest strong לָּֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- shall not נָס֥וֹג <WH5472> na-Sog So will not we go back מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <WH4480> mi-Me-ka; at תְּ֝חַיֵּ֗נוּ <WH2421> te-chai-Ye-nu, from thee quicken וּבְשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> u-ve-shim-Cha upon thy name נִקְרָֽא׃ <WH7121> nik-Ra. us and we will call

יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts הֲשִׁיבֵ֑נוּ <WH7725> ha-shi-Ve-nu; Turn us again הָאֵ֥ר <WH215> ha-'Er to shine פָּ֝נֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha, cause thy face וְנִוָּשֵֽׁעָה׃ <WH3467> ve-niv-va-She-'ah. and we shall be saved
